Our hands-on tutorial on "Reproducibility in Transportation Research" from ITSC 2024 is now freely available online.

**What's Included**
- Slide decks and presentations
- Code examples and templates
- Live demo recordings
- Participant resources and worksheets

These materials are designed to help researchers and practitioners adopt reproducible research workflows in their own work. [Access the full materials â†’](https://www.rerite.org/itsc24-rr-tutorial/)
